ActivityMetadata.Name: ZM List Zoom Meetings Client Feedbacks
ActivityMetadata.Label: ZM List Zoom Meetings Client Feedbacks
ActivityMetadata.Description:
Retrieve survey results from [Zoom meetings client feedback](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/115005855266-End-of-Meeting-Feedback-Survey#h_e30d552b-6d8e-4e0a-a588-9ca8180c4dbf). You can specify a monthly date range for the dashboard data using the `from` and `to` query parameters. The month should fall within the last six months.
**Prerequisites:** * Business or higher account * [Feedback to Zoom](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/115005838023) enabled.
**Scope:** `account:read:admin`
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# Zoom

List Zoom Meetings Client Feedbacks

Retrieve survey results from [Zoom meetings client feedback](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/115005855266-End-of-Meeting-Feedback-Survey#h_e30d552b-6d8e-4e0a-a588-9ca8180c4dbf). You can specify a monthly date range for the dashboard data using the `from` and `to` query parameters. The month should fall within the last six months. **Prerequisites:** * Business or higher account * [Feedback to Zoom](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/115005838023) enabled. **Scope:** `account:read:admin`

Method: Get

OperationID: dashboardClientFeedback

EndPoint:

/metrics/client/feedback
